articles.author: Katie Hunt, CNN
articles.title: Can probiotics help with depression? New research suggests a link
articles.description: A new review of preliminary medical literature has suggested that probiotics -- foods or supplements containing microbes thought to exert a positive influence on our gut -- could help ease depression.

articles.title: International students may need to leave US if their universities transition to online-only learning
articles.description: International students who are pursuing degrees in the United States will have to leave the country or risk deportation if their universities switch to online-only courses, Immigration and Customs Enforcement announced Monday.
